overview:
Rephraserz Media and Communication Services (RMACS) a competent and ambitious company which has spread out its flying colors on multiple services actuate business doers and individuals to break out their barriers in communication and give a flexible support in touching world across boundaries. The quaintness of Rephraserz makes it a perfect partner for many business professionals and individuals enabling continuous service even after product delivery reinventing the marketing ethics. We take pride in being the best translation providers and offering a unique service to our beloved clients irrespective of subjects with a quick turnaround time.

Mission

Rephraserz mission is to propel individual or business doers to succeed in their key areas beyond cultures and nurturing strong relationship with ethical business practices.

Vision

Rephraserz vision is to become a global player in service sector not only by satisfying client needs, but to catalyse small and medium sized organization to continue succeeding in their business.

Values Rephraserz gives a deep review on customer needs and do always have an alternative but creative solution in bringing out unbreakable values. Services: Translation, Localization, Voice Over, Interpretation, Web Designing, Subtitling, Transcription, Content Writing, Market Research, Web Designing, Soft Sill Training, Market Research and other creative services Leadership: With acquired knowledge and continuous effort Rephraserz management team influences their co-workers to accomplish their objective and directs the organization more cohesive and coherent. They carry out their process knowing their primary roles and responsibilities and serve as a bridge between the client and vendors.

For details contact us at: Rephraserz Media And Communication Services No.125 4th Floor Cisons Complex, 150 Montieth Road, Egmore Chennai - 600008 Tel:044 43542344 Website:www.rephraserz.com
